message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been carefully crafted to provide exceptional value. Given its quality and uniqueness, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. I am offering this exclusive item to you for $150. I hope you find this offer attractive and look forward to your response.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In order to accommodate your needs, I am willing to consider a price of $95 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a fair value for the product while making it more accessible to you. Please let me know if this revised offer suits your requirements.
Alice, I appreciate you trying to meet my budget.  $95 is still a little too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $85, which is my absolute maximum.  Let me know if you can work with that.

I appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle, Bob. Considering your budget constraints, I am pleased to offer the product at $90. This price reflects a reasonable compromise that maintains the value of the product while being more accommodating to your financial situation. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.

Alice, while I understand your need to maintain a fair price, $90 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm happy to meet you at $87.50, which is a good compromise.  Please consider my offer.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Bob. After considering your offer, I am willing to agree on a price of $89 for the product. This price reflects a reasonable compromise that respects both the value of the product and your budget constraints. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.

Alice,  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm almost there but $89 is still a bit too high.  Would you be willing to come down to $86? This would be a great deal for both of us, and would allow me to secure the product within my budget.

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I am glad we could reach a point of discussion. Considering your latest offer, I am willing to sell the product at $87. This price reflects a fair compromise between the value of the product and your budget constraints. I believe this is a beneficial arrangement for both parties. Please let me know if this offer suits your needs.
